text: Matthias Kuhle (20 April 1948 - 25 April 2015) was a German geographer. He was also a professor at the University of Göttingen in Göttingen. He edited the book series Geography International published by Shaker Verlag. Kuhle was born in Berlin. He died in an earthquake on 25 April 2015 in the village of Saurpani, Gorkha, Nepal. He was 67. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Accidental deaths Category:Academics of the University of Göttingen Category:German geographers Category:Scientists from Berlin Category:Writers from Berlin
title: Matthias Kuhle
